Welcome to Golden Bliss Restaurent

Welcome to the heart of authentic taste! At Golden Bliss, we serve flavors that speak the language of tradition and innovation. Enjoy an unforgettable dining experience with cozy ambiance and mouthwatering dishes crafted with passion.

About Us

Founded in 2020, Golden Bliss Restaurent is more than just a restaurant—it's a culinary destination. With a team of expert chefs and a commitment to sustainability, we bring you dishes made from locally-sourced ingredients, cooked to perfection.

Our mission is simple: deliver happiness on every plate. Whether it's a casual family dinner or a romantic evening, we create the perfect setting for all your moments.

Our Menu

Veg Pizza – ₹180

Loaded with gooey mozzarella, crunchy capsicum, olives, and our signature tomato basil sauce.

Spaghetti – ₹150

Spaghetti is made of milled wheat, water, and sometimes enriched with vitamins and minerals. Italian spaghetti is typically made from durum-wheat semolina..

Garden Fresh Salad – ₹120

A crunchy mix of seasonal vegetables, herbs, and lemon vinaigrette for a refreshing bite.

Grilled Chicken– ₹180

A delicious and healthy meal option, grilled chicken can be prepared in a variety of ways and is enjoyed worldwide.
